name: Useless_Conversation
0:
”Alexa start let's converse”
”How do you eat cornflakes”
”What do you eat to be fit”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: let's converse
des:
It is a skill I created to learn about the developpement of a skill.
You can know if she loves you, the food she eats, if she knows the weather of the day in a precise year. (And also know how she eats Cornflakes :) )
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
